body_html:
@soumith Indeed, the problem with the patch was that it tried to put it's test before the somewhat moody test_lstm_fusion_concat_cuda. I can see that that was impolite and arranged for my test to yield the way.

(Iterating a manual seed 0..99, test_lstm_fusion_concat_cuda fails in 9 cases for me, I'll file a bug.)

body:
@soumith Indeed, the problem with the patch was that it tried to put it's test before the somewhat moody `test_lstm_fusion_concat_cuda`. I can see that that was impolite and arranged for my test to yield the way.

(Iterating a manual seed 0..99, `test_lstm_fusion_concat_cuda` fails in 9 cases for me, I'll file a bug.)
